[ Absolute Health Korat Integrative Medical Center ](https://absolute-health.org/en/blog/post/evt-qc9m.html) Absolute Health Korat Integrative Medical Center, the leading provider of anti-aging healthcare in Nakhon Ratchasima Province, recently hosted a spectacular Thank You Party under the theme "The Secret to Ultimate Health." We are proud to introduce Absolute Health Clinic Hat Yai, a new branch strategically located near Hat Yai Wittayalai School in Songkhla province.
